SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Interface ClientCommunicationInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, ClientRmi, ClientTcp
public interface ClientCommunicationInterface extends Remote
This class defines the methods that a client must implement independently of the communication protocol used. These methods are implemented by the Client class, which is extended by the classes that implement the communication protocols.
